**Title** #EV385-221108 - Fencing Contractor Services
==========================

**Solicitation Information**
-------------------------

| Key | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS3628133799 |
| Publication Date | 2023-05-15 |
| Closing Date | 2023-06-14T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Number | 1 |
| Publication Number | WS3628133799-Doc3628182961 |

**Notice Details**
-----------------

| Key | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Notice Type | Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) |
| Method of Procurement | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price |

**Contract Requirements**
---------------------

* Fencing maintenance and repairs at four Correctional Service of Canada facilities in Saskatchewan
* Provision of skilled labor, tools, equipment, supervision, and material
* Acceptance of conditional PSIB requirements

**Bidding Instructions**
-------------------

* The closing time for receipt of bids is 2023-06-14T14:00:00.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the above date and time.
* Bids submitted after 2023-06-14T14:00:00 will be considered non-responsive.

**Terms and Conditions**
----------------------

A standing offer will be awarded for a period of three years. It is anticipated that a single bidder will be selected..

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

**Notice Content**
-----------------
